q: of Defense Donald Rumsfeld describes a President Bush administration marred by chaos and disorder during the months leading up to the Iraq War- the prime reason, he says, why the postwar transition was so poorly planned. There were far too many hands on the steering wheel, which, in my view, was a formula for running the truck into a ditch, writes Donald Rumsfeld in Known and Known, which is set to hit bookstores next week.
